content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's only talk about the rental price for now. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be in great condition, being newly built and in the city center. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the ideal location and modern features, I propose a rental price of 650 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a higher price given the prime location of the apartment. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Taking your feedback into account, I'm adjusting my offer to 720 Euros monthly. However, I must remind you of my diligence in seeking a reasonable rent due to my dependable and responsible nature.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your diligence, but I believe there's still room for improvement in your offer. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: In light of our negotiation, I am willing to lower my expectations slightly while remaining fair. I propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This offer considers both my responsibility and the desire to secure this desirable apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your fairness, but I believe the apartment's prime location and modern features justify a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given our back-and-forth, I recognize the importance of finding a mutually agreeable price. I adjust my offer slightly higher to 730 Euros monthly, while still maintaining my principles of seeking a reasonable rent.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your principles, but I believe the apartment's prime location and modern features justify a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: With the understanding of our differing perspectives, I propose a rental price of 750 Euros per month, considering both your expectations and my commitment to a fair deal.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your commitment to a fair deal, and I believe we're getting closer to a mutually agreeable price. However, I still believe the apartment's prime location and modern features justify a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
